Abinye David Jumbo nke amaara site aha ọgbọ bụ Mr 2Kay, bụ onye Naịjirịa na- agụ egwú na odee egwu
debanyere aha ya na Grafton Entertainment
ma ọ hapụrụ lebeelụ ahụ na 2018 ka ọ mepee nke ya "Better Life Entertainment"
A mụrụ Mr 2Kay na Port Harcourt
Mgbe amụchara ya, ezinulo ya kwagara Bonny Island, Rivers Steeti ebe o toro
2Kay bụkwa ezigbo onye omenkà ebe ọ na-ese ihe osise ka ọ na-etolite

Mazị 2Kay malitere ọrụ egwu ya na Port Harcourt mana mbupụta ya na Port Harcourt bụ waterside boy mana  bupụtaghị ya na mba ọzọ were ruo 2012 mgbe Mr 2Kay wepụtara Bubugaga nke bupụtara ya na mba ọzọ.
Egwu mpụta mbụ Mr 2Kay "Bubugaga" pụtara na 8 Ọktoba 2012
Vidio egwu ahụ bụ "Bubugaga" bụ na London, UK  ka etiri ya nke Nosa Igbinedion duziri n'okpuru Grafton Entertainment
Nke bụ otu egwu zuru mba
Emepụtara mpụta egwu mbụ Mr 2Kay bụ "Waterside Boy" na 21 Ọgụstụ 2011 n'okpuru Grafton Entertainment
Nke bụ egwu ya wuru ewu na Port Harcourt

Na 25 Ọktọba 2017, ndị ohi anọ ji egbe zuru Mr 2Kay n' ime ụlọ nkwari akụ ya na "Eko Hotels na Suites" na Victoria Island, Legọọsụ mgbe ọ gosipụtachara egwu ya na kọnsaatị 2Baba nke 'Buckwyld na Breathless Kọnsaatị, nke mere na etiti mgbakọ ụlọ nkwarị akụ nke Eko
Ndi ohi ahụ merụrụ 2Kay ahụ nke sitere na izu ohi ahụ, kee ya agbụ, aka, ụkwụ na ọnụ wee zukọcha ihe ndị dị oke ọnụ nke gụnyere, uwe, ọla, ekwentị, mmanụ na-esi isi, na ego

Otu izu ezuru ohi gachara Mr 2Kay wepụtara egwu ọhụụ"Pray for me" nke a haziri maka ị pụta na ngwụcha Nọvemba tinyere abọm ya na-abịanụ akwụsịrị n'ihi ihe mere na  ya, lebeelụ ya Grafton Records  nyere ọtụtụ oge maka ị wepụta abọm ya
Na 7 Nọvemba 2017, Mr 2Kay gbara akwụkwọ gbara ndị ụlọ ọrụ nkwali akụ Eko akwụkwọ nde nari ise maka ihe ahụ mere ya na Ọktọba
Ọ rụrụla n'ọtụtụ ihe mmemme na-ewu ewu ma, ọ rụrụ na mmemme dịka:
Na Sọnde, 17 Juunu 2018, na Aztech Arcum Stadium Road Port Harcourt, Rivers Steeti Naịjirịa

Mr 2Kay wepụtara kọnsaatị abọm "Elevated" gụnyere ndị egwu,ndị ozi redio/ ndị na-ahaịpụ  & DJ  Timaya, Duncan Mighty, Harrysong, Charles Okocha, DJ Jimmy Jatt, DJ Neptune, DJ Big N, DJ Kev, Joenell, Ayi, Real Prince, Idahams, Doray, Young GreyC, Squeeze Tarela, Legendary Sunny, Ajebo Hustlers, King Perryy, M Trill, Korkormikor, Olisa Adibua, Shope Shopsy na Alex nke Big Brother Naija (oge 3)
E rere ihe nkiri ahụ na ikike nke karịrị 2000 (puku abụọ),  e rere tiketi n'ime ọnụma nke (₦ 2,000-500,000)
Mr 2Kay posted on his social media pages on 2 April 2018, to announce a singing/dancing competition where he'll be giving away $2000 (Two Thousand Dollars) to 2 persons in Port Harcourt
